item.description:
PLEASE NOTE CHANGES to LOCATION and TIME.
There is a high percentage chance of rain in the morning and the courts at Professors Row will most likely be locked for graduation (they were locked on Saturday). The meetup is rescheduled to the lower courts. If they are locked, then the alternative location will be at Dillboy Park (off of Route 2).

Meetup Details --

What: Tennis Meetup at Tufts

Normally: Tufts University Tennis Courts
99 Professors Row, Somerville, MA 02144

Nomally: Every Sunday 8:30 AM to 10:30 AM
item.name: Sunday Meetup at Tufts
